context.name: FAB Defense AG47 Ergonomic Pistol Grip
context.excerpt: The AG-47 Ergonomic Pistol Grip from FAB Defense provides enhanced grip and improved weapon handling for your AK-47/74.
context.content:
The AG-47 Ergonomic Pistol Grip from FAB Defense provides enhanced grip and improved weapon handling for your AK-47/74.

 

AG47 Ergonomic Pistol Grip Advantages:

Ergonomic design prevents wrist fatigue and ensures secure grip
Improves trigger operation
Built-In storage compartment with removable 2x CR123 battery holder
Made of MIL-SPEC fiberglass reinforced polymer composite
Finger grooves and backstrap shape for enhanced, more comfortable grip

 

AG47 Ergonomic Pistol Grip Compatibility:

AK-47/74, AKS-74U 'Krinkov', Galil Models
